comments:
After bug https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=124364 occurs, if you shutdown and reopen the workspace and attempt to open the config file in the editor you will get:

Unable to create this part due to an internal error. Reason for the failure: An unexpected exception was thrown.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wtp.jsf.facesconfig.editor.pageflow.utils.PageflowTransform.hasSameFromViewID(PageflowTransform.java:273)
	at org.eclipse.wtp.jsf.facesconfig.editor.pageflow.utils.PageflowTransform.getNavigationRule(PageflowTransform.java:686)
	at org.eclipse.wtp.jsf.facesconfig.editor.pageflow.utils.PageflowTransform.addPageToPageNavigationRule(PageflowTransform.java:721)
	at org.eclipse.wtp.jsf.facesconfig.editor.pageflow.utils.PageflowTransform.getNavigationRulesInPageflow(PageflowTransform.java:214)
	at org.eclipse.wtp.jsf.facesconfig.editor.pageflow.utils.PageflowTransform.updatePageflowModel(PageflowTransform.java:142)
	at org.eclipse.wtp.jsf.facesconfig.editor.pageflow.utils.FacesConfigModelAdapter.updatePageflowFromFacesConfig(FacesConfigModelAdapter.java:468)
	at org.eclipse.wtp.jsf.facesconfig.editor.FacesConfigEditor.createAndAddSourcePage(FacesConfigEditor.java:678)
	at org.eclipse.wtp.jsf.facesconfig.editor.FacesConfigEditor.addPages(FacesConfigEditor.java:562)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.editor.FormEditor.createPages(FormEditor.java:133)
	...
	
To resolve it requires the deletion of CONFIGFILENAME.pageflow file and restart of eclipse.
Fixed, please verify on RC2 or later. Already checkin to the CVS.

no longer reproducible

tested and verified using 1.5RC6
